advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes:
We're always working hard to optimize our app with the latest technologies and best new features. This version includes a number of UI/UX improvements as well as stability enhancements. 
Enjoy!
description:
TAKE YOUR FIRST BITE OF FOODORA 

If there’s one thing we know, it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring delicious food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door.

Check we're in your city by downloading the app.

Whatever you crave, we’ll bring it and we always go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. In the mood for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. 

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring tasty food right to your door.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (apartment/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier head over to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time.
 
WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora selects your local favourites; the best food near you. Thai or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be prepared with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's food to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE? 

Naturally, your safety is important to us. That’s why we guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you want and pay how you want.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d love to hear what you have to say about us. You know, all the food thoughts that run through your brain and the confessions you have from your teenage years. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.ca. We would love to hear from you.

For further info, visit
www.foodora.ca
